title: Create Your DAO
subtitle: Launch your decentralized autonomous organization in minutes

network.title: Choose Network
network.description: Select the blockchain network for your DAO

networkTypes.ethereumMainnet: Ethereum Mainnet: The primary Ethereum blockchain with highest security but higher gas fees
networkTypes.layer2Networks: Layer 2 Networks: Optimism, Arbitrum, etc. offer lower fees while inheriting Ethereum security
networkTypes.alternativeL1s: Alternative L1s: Networks like Avalanche, BNB Chain offer different trade-offs
networkTypes.testnets: Testnets: For testing before deploying to mainnet (free to use)

details.title: DAO Details
details.description: Configure your DAO and governance token

daoName.label: DAO Name
daoName.helper: The name of your decentralized autonomous organization

tokenName.label: Token Name
tokenName.helper: The name of your governance token

tokenSymbol.label: Token Symbol
tokenSymbol.helper: A short identifier for your token (e.g., BTC, ETH)

tokenSupply.label: Token Supply
tokenSupply.helper: The total number of tokens that will be created

review.title: Review
review.description: Review your DAO configuration before deployment
review.reviewDescription: Please review your DAO configuration before deployment. Once deployed, some settings cannot be changed.

deployment.title: Deployment
deployment.description: Deploy your DAO to the blockchain
deployment.managementPlatforms: You can now manage your DAO using these platforms:
deployment.waitingForDeployment: Please wait while your DAO is being deployed to the blockchain...
deployment.daoIsLive: Your {{daoName}} DAO is now live on the blockchain
deployment.daoFullyFunctional: Your DAO is now fully functional with governance capabilities, token management, and treasury controls.
deployment.blockExplorerDescription: You can view your transaction details on the blockchain explorer to track its status and verify the deployment.
deployment.registerDescription: To propose actions, vote, or manage assets, connect your DAO to a management interface.
deployment.stakeDescription: Stake your initial token to gain voting power in your DAO's governance system.
deployment.proposalDescription: Create your first governance proposal to distribute tokens or manage treasury assets.

validation.maxSupply: Must be less than or equal to {{max}}

howItWorks.title: How Token Distribution Works
howItWorks.description: After deployment, you'll receive 1 token to start participating in governance. The remaining tokens will be stored in the treasury and can be distributed through governance proposals approved by the community.

network.switchToSupported: Please switch to a supported network to create your DAO
network.switchingNetwork: Switching network... Please confirm in your wallet.
network.switchFailed: Failed to switch network. Please check your wallet and try again.
network.tooltip: The blockchain network where your DAO will be deployed. Each network has different characteristics and fees.
network.notSupported: Your current network is not supported. Please switch to a supported network.
network.sepoliaNote: For fast testing, Sepolia DAOs are deployed with a 5-minute voting period.

version.tooltip: The version of the DAO contracts to deploy. Newer versions may include additional features or improvements.

architecture.title: Your DAO Architecture
architecture.daoCoreDescription: Central governance hub for proposals, voting, and execution of community decisions
architecture.daoTokenDescription: ERC20 governance token with customizable tax mechanisms and distribution controls
architecture.treasuryDescription: Secure vault for managing DAO assets, controlled by governance proposals
architecture.stakingDescription: Time-based staking with voting power multipliers for long-term holders
architecture.upgradeableProxies: All contracts are deployed as upgradeable proxies with the latest implementations

governance.title: Governance
governance.description: Create proposals and vote on important decisions

token.title: Governance Token
token.description: ERC-20 token for voting rights and governance

multiSig.title: Multi-Signature
multiSig.description: Require multiple approvals for critical actions

wallet.readyToDeploy: Your wallet is connected and ready to deploy the DAO
wallet.connectionMessage: You need to connect a Web3 wallet to deploy your DAO. This allows you to:

networkNotSupported.title: Network Not Supported
networkNotSupported.description: Your wallet ({{connector}}) does not support {{network}}. Please choose a different network or use a different wallet.

deploymentCost.title: Estimated Deployment Cost
deploymentCost.description: Deploying your DAO will cost approximately:
deploymentCost.note: Note: Actual cost may vary based on network conditions at the time of deployment.

whatHappensNext.title: What Happens Next
whatHappensNext.description: When you click "Continue to Pre-Deployment", the following will happen:
whatHappensNext.checkBalance: We'll check your wallet balance to ensure you have enough funds
whatHappensNext.simulateTransaction: We'll simulate the transaction to verify it will succeed
whatHappensNext.confirmTransaction: Your wallet will prompt you to confirm the transaction
whatHappensNext.deployContracts: The DAO contracts will be deployed to the {{network}} network
whatHappensNext.receiveToken: You'll receive 1 {{symbol}} token to start participating in governance
whatHappensNext.treasuryStorage: The remaining {{amount}} {{symbol}} will be stored in the treasury

preDeployment.title: Pre-Deployment Checks
preDeployment.description: We'll run a few checks to ensure your DAO deployment will be successful. This helps prevent failed transactions and wasted gas fees.

balanceCheck.title: Wallet Balance Check
balanceCheck.description: Verifying you have enough {{symbol}} to deploy
balanceCheck.sponsoredDescription: Your transaction is sponsored - no gas fees required

simulation.title: Transaction Simulation
simulation.description: Simulating the deployment on {{network}} to ensure success

signing.title: Transaction Signing
signing.inProgress: Please sign the transaction in your wallet...
signing.description: Sign the transaction with your wallet to deploy the DAO

confirmation.title: Transaction Confirmation
confirmation.description: Wait for the transaction to be confirmed on the blockchain

networkMismatch.title: Network Mismatch
networkMismatch.description: Your wallet is connected to {{current}}, but you selected {{selected}} for deployment.
networkMismatch.switching: Switching network... Please confirm in your wallet.
networkMismatch.switchFailed: Failed to switch automatically. Please change your network manually in your wallet.
networkMismatch.switchNeeded: Please switch your network to {{network}} to continue.

transaction.unexpectedErrorDetails: An unexpected error occurred during transaction simulation
transaction.insufficientBalanceDetails: Insufficient balance: You need {{amount}} {{symbol}} more to complete this transaction.
transaction.insufficientBalanceDetailsPlain: You need {{amount}} {{symbol}} more to complete this transaction.
transaction.tipTransactionProcessing: Tip: Your transaction might still be processing. Check the explorer to see its status.
transaction.tipAddMoreFunds: Tip: Add more funds to your wallet and try again.
transaction.tipIncreaseGasLimit: Tip: Try increasing the gas limit in your wallet settings.
transaction.tipIncreaseGasPrice: Tip: Try increasing the gas price in your wallet settings.
transaction.tipResetWallet: Tip: Try resetting your wallet's transaction history or adjusting the nonce manually.
transaction.tipWalletDisconnected: Tip: Your wallet is disconnected. Please reconnect your wallet and try again.
transaction.tipWalletPermission: Tip: Your wallet needs permission to interact with this contract. Open your wallet and check for permission requests.
transaction.noteRejectedTransaction: Note: You rejected the transaction in your wallet. If this was unintentional, please try again.
transaction.simulationErrorMessage: The contract simulation encountered an error. This may be due to contract restrictions or network issues.
